GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
drm/radeon: Add the missed acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit 50113de0f1e913c0b733e21d3e61fe9c0f2e9d50, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit 268ba0a99f89a84dc5eb312470896113d0709c74. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/radeon: Add the missed acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak
